properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesu, Yesu morranaalinchu Anyulai navaari bilvan marvaboku nan{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rakshakaa nan marva boku morranaalinchu Anyulaina vaarinbilvan marva boku nan{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee krupaasanambu nodda shaanthimiyyumu Pashchaathaapa pade nannu naadarinchumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Needu punya menu nammi yaashrayinthu nin krunginatti Naadu naatma broovu premato{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naaku sukhadaata veeve jeevadaatave Ihaparamulayandu dikku neevegaa{/lang-eng}
